extendedInfo.description: Aces Bubble PopperPop! Pop! Pop! Enjoy a classic bubble pop game with a twist. Aces Bubble Popper includes three different game modes for tons of bubble popping fun! Attempt to burst all the bubbles in the Classic mode or race the clock to pop the required number of bubbles with the Timed mode.For a truly unique experience try Super Action mode with specials, like bubble swap and bubble gum, to clear bubbles even faster. Become an expert at all three of the mini-games in the Super Action mode to gain even more points and earn a place at the top for the online leaderboards!Game Features:â¢ 3 different game types: Classic, Timed, and Super Action.â¢ Easy, Medium, and Hard difficulties!â¢ Specials to earn extra points and pass levels faster.â¢ Fun and challenging mini-games in Super Action mode. â¢ Additional bubble colors on higher levels. â¢ Online Leaderboards: personal, daily, weekly and overall.â¢ Tracks tons of statistics!Permissions requested and how they are used:â¢  Full Internet Access: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  View Network State: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  Modify/delete USB storage Contents Modify/delete SD Card Contents: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  Read Phone State and Identity: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  View Wi-Fi State: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  Control Vibrator: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device.â¢  Automatically start at boot: This permission is used for push notifications, users can turn push notifications off in the marketing inbox.More games from Concrete Software:PBA Bowling ChallengeJellyflop!Aces SpadesWordsplosionAces Gin RummyAces HeartsAces Traffic PackAces Jewel Hunt

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: Really make me love this game, its easy to play and im having fun...i like the prices and the bonus time to play...thank u!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grrrrrr
reviews.comment: Bought the no ad version in order to get rid of that STUPID Jack in the Box commercial and.........I still get it! Thought I may have not done it correctly, so I tried it again. It said, \"You already own this version\" so I know it\'s purchased. Jack in the Box.....Get out of my phone!!!!
reviews.author: Gayle McAleese

reviews.title: LINDA K
reviews.comment: I used to love playing this game. But, f--k you and your annoying LOUD ads you decided was a good idea. Way to ruin a good thing idiots. Eff you!
reviews.author: Linda Kongsvik

reviews.title: Hate the stupid ads
reviews.comment: Hate the ads. Even after purchasing the add free version, I still get them. Such a rip off. But love the game.
reviews.author: Viri Perez Varela

reviews.title: Hate the so called\"bonus games\"
reviews.comment: The game itself is a lot of fun. I really wish there was a way to bypass the stupid \"bonus\" games. That\'s not what I want to play. Galaxy note 2

reviews.comment: I pretty  much h avethe same game on the app pou. Other than that, great app!

reviews.title: Great fun.
reviews.comment: This game is easy at all levels, but soon addicting.

reviews.title: Popper elite
reviews.comment: I love this game, it keeps u going. It fast pace and exciteing.
reviews.author: Denise Staples

reviews.title: Aces Bubble Popper .
reviews.comment: Absolutely my favorite app in the market !!! Have tried many and immediately uninstalled. First thing in the morning and last thing at night !! It\'s my poison ....should come with a warning label !!! \"Highly addictive ;  your housework and family will be neglected !!! Thanks for my dirty house ;) i would give 10 stars !

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game to pass the time, my kids are \342\231\245ing it an cant put it down once they get started playing.
reviews.author: Leslie Bowie

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Its awesome! I can\'t without playing it..
reviews.author: marivic jimenez

reviews.title: Strategic Bubbles!
reviews.comment: Fun!  This is easy enough to play around with when you just want to zone out, but really doing well requires some actual strategy!  I\'ve enjoyed this and will probably play it frequently.
reviews.author: Patti Jareo

reviews.title: Love love love!
reviews.comment: This game is ridiculously fun I enjoy every minute of it. The minigames are also so competitive which is what I love thankz keep up the good work! And make more games
reviews.author: Sonya Burgos

reviews.title: Bubble popper
reviews.comment: I really like this game its a lot of fun to play \"-)

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: I can get entertained with this game for a while. It\'s fun and I love playing it. Has no glitches and runs great :)

reviews.title: millielinda
reviews.comment: Good game and addictive! Runs ok too.

reviews.title: Parrotbay
reviews.comment: Addictive game. Trying to clear the board is fun and challenging

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Habit forming and fun!  Great stress reliever.  Love breaking my own records.

reviews.title: Addictive game
reviews.comment: Best game ever that I have played that is a bubble pop game

reviews.title: Good game ruined by ads. Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Very addictive game but seeing Jack In The Box ads nearly every level has gotten irritating. I paid for \"no more ads\" and thought it stood to reason that the commercials would stop. Now I know why it was a non-refundable purchase. Scams are fun aren\'t they
reviews.author: Richard F
